title: Free mystery skin
body: so i was playing a normal game , and at the end of it i got a mystery skin from riot for free . happened to anybody else before ?{{champion:107}}

replies.body: Since he got one I think we should all get one... just to make it fair

This happened to my other account: DTGagfraghag.
Where I didn't own Riot Kayle, and I got her. Then a few days later got another mystery skin: Feral Warwick.
I'm not upset, but curious.

Looking into this for you, it looks like you received a gift per the [anniversary announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you).  Since you already had Riot Kayle, you instead received a mystery gift of Hextech Sion.  Congrats!
